website_summaries.verdict: Delivers similar power and design as higher priced models for a surprisingly low price. If you have your heart set on a Miele vacuum but are watching your budget, this is the one.
pros: In addition to having a host of tools similar to higher-priced models, this powerful machine boasts turbo-powered suction thanks to its 6-stage vortex motor
It's also lightweight and easy to maneuver
cons: Doesn't perform quite as well on high-pile carpet, but it has a lot to offer on almost every other front

customer_reviews.title: I had a Miele in Germany that was the best vacuum I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I had a Miele in Germany that was the best vacuum I ever owned. This one is not as high quality; one of the brush attachments broke after only about a month. I'm disappointed - still deciding if I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: might be good for all solid surface flooring
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum head very small. Roller brush in vacuum head recessed deeply so it will not reach carpet. Not meant for medium pile carpet as described, might be good for all solid surface flooring. Cheaply made light weight vacuum head and attachments. Super disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Miele power head did a good job on my low pile carpets and its filtration ...
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my 25+ year old Kenmore Progressive Vac. which still runs. Miele power head did a good job on my low pile carpets and its filtration system appears to be top notch. Very disappointed with the amount of cheap plastic in the unit and its accessories. Things are going to break. Compact size and less weight are nice but dust bag size is very small which will probably require frequent and costly changes. Compared to my old Kenmore, this Miele model is a big let down. At $200 or so it would be a good buy; at $400 it is way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Instead of saving up for this expensive vacuum, I should have bought an $80 one from Walmart. The photo shows my carpet after 15 minutes of vacuuming the same area rug over and over again. This is supposed to be the “turbo pet” model, but it is completely incapable of sucking up any amount of pet hair. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. Works fine on hard surfaces, but so does a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Kvittem

customer_reviews.title: All Miele - in a small workhorse model.
customer_reviews.text: This Miele is a little workhorse of a vacuum. Hardly takes up any space in your closet. Reliable like the bigger models with plenty of power. The only drawback to this model is the Turbo-brush is suction driven, not electric. I also have the electric model, but the price difference is significant. That said, it works perfectly on smooth floors, tile, wood and some tight low carpets or rugs. It would not be suitable for thicker pile or shag carpets.
customer_reviews.author: MarginCall

customer_reviews.title: So easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner! It rolls around so easily and is light weight. The hose is long and the wands expand a long way. So much easier to handle than other vacuums I have had. And on top of all this, really cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Great-grandma

customer_reviews.title: I hated canister vacs before because they always seemed bulky and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the lightest vacuum I have ever owned. I hated canister vacs before because they always seemed bulky and were difficult to maneuver around furniture. This is not the case for this one. It gets all the dirt and rocks up on my carpet and hardwood floors. The fact that it is lightweight allows my two children to use it. Which is a plus for me. Highly recommend this for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brzezinski

customer_reviews.title: but it works well enough - it's quite light which is nice and I like the ease of changing the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: The carpet head is only powered by the suction, so it doesn't move and pick up quite as well as I was expecting on our carpet which I thought was a low pile, but it works well enough - it's quite light which is nice and I like the ease of changing the bag though not the cost of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured, a compact C1 1200W was sent. Not Turbo 2000W.
customer_reviews.text: The one pictured is Turbo, 2000W. The one sent is a compact C1 1200W. I bought a Miele Capelle 10 years ago which just died. So I bought this one to replace it. The plastic is thinner and cheaper. The motor also seems weaker and the suction is not as good. The attachments are also a bit cheaper, thinner plastic. That being said, I've been using the vacuum for a few weeks and I still feel that Miele is the best vacuum on the market. It has the strongest motor and will last the longest.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum SUCKS !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Miele vacuums.I had my other Miele for 17 years and only had to have one repair done after about 13 years. This one was more basic than my previous one and I love it. Lightweight and quiet but great suction. It even works good (not great) on carpet but most canisters vacuums don't do well on carpets. I have two dogs that shed a lot and live in Florida so sand is always an issue. I highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Looney

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a C3
customer_reviews.text: super cheap-o, its looks and feels like a cheap knock off
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever owned. Easy to use on stairs, lightweight. Cleans floor carpet great - comes with many tools - easy to change bags and change tools. Well designed. I used to have a canister vac without bags and it was dusty and didn't clean as well. I am a believe in Miele now. Worth every penny - now cleaning my house more thoroughly and way faster.
customer_reviews.author: Redmond Weasel

customer_reviews.title: Love this vaccum! Spend the money!
customer_reviews.text: Always had kenmoore canisters but heard they aren’t as good anymore so needed to try something new! I love this vaccum! I bought this style one for the separate carpet piece. Great suction! Light weight. Bags are installed easy and in a good way. Easy to change filters. Use it to clean my car as well!
customer_reviews.author: Breann Shearer

customer_reviews.title: This is a light and convenient vacuum cleaner. Although ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a light and convenient vacuum cleaner. Although it has multiple settings for floors and floor coverings, the unit is most effective on bare floors and carpets with very little or no pile. Medium pile wall-to-wall carpeting seems to tax the motor. This machine is effective in picking up tenacious pet hair from floors and low pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: M. Constantinides

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Small but powerful with lots of control. Well designed and easy to store. The rotary brush attachment does a great job at picking up my dog's hair off carpeting. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum in world!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has changed the way I look at that terrible chore. It's light, easy to manage, and the suction is amazing! The different attachments are perfect, the rug head is so Good! After hauling around my 20 year old Electrolux, it is a welcome change and cleans even better! No more bending over to get baseboards and corners, the heads come off and you can suck up anything you like, it even reaches the cob webs on ceilings! 😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cat and Dog Miele also but I love this Miele more. It is super light weight and digs into super thick carpet, no problem. It is also great on stairs- much easier to use than the heavier unit. The only thing I don't like is the accessory tools which don't stay on the unit well so they end up being stored on a shelf which is not convenient. Aside from that design flaw, it is the perfect vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum but a Bit Expensive
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive for a Canister Vacuum but it works, not sure I would buy it again when there are others out there for less money that perform as well. I had a Dyson which I spent money on as well and I would never buy another fell apart in 2 years, I just don’t see the value of stuff like this so overpriced with technology changing so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great vac!  excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: love this little vac. as much cleaning wallop as the larger version, but more suitable to tote up and down stairs and clean a smaller space. light and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vacuum Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and ready to use! I am impressed with how well made it is and it does a nice job. Very easy to maneuver the turbo brush and hard floor attachment. Last but not least thank you Amazon for the interest free payment plan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vac for use in our condo. We like it because it's so small and portable but still works as well as a large vac. We don't have a lot of space and it stores in a small space. We also own a upright Miele for our house and I think the small one works just as well as the highly rated upright.
customer_reviews.author: D and B

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Well Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this canister vacuum. There are six choices for suction power—I can clean drapes and remove cat hair from my oriental carpet. It is reasonable in weight so I can clean my stairs which lead to the second floor. I found generic bags which are economical to use. Honestly the vacuum is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lutter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Made of cheap plastic. Poor suction. High-pitched whine when vacuum. Totally OVERPRICED.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: A great choice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughters. They moved into a condo with 3 cats and they said this vacuum does a great job on pet hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Labesky

customer_reviews.title: - The turbo brush for the carpet gets clogged up easily. Ideal to vacuum 'clean' carpets
customer_reviews.text: Cons: - As someone mentioned before replacement dust bags are very expensive. - The turbo brush for the carpet gets clogged up easily. Ideal to vacuum 'clean' carpets!!. Pros: - Very lightweight and easy to work with, very mobile. - Ideal for small/clean houses.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo André Moura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I finally gave up on vacuums that last less than a year and can't be repaired. I took the recommendation of a local vacuum repairman and purchase this unit. I liked the first one so much, that I purchase a second one for my summer home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, good value
customer_reviews.text: My first Miele (over 20 years old) suddenly become quite loud, and the motor was failing. The compact C1 turbo was a great replacement, works better than my original model.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Custy

customer_reviews.title: so good! I have a dog and we go for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I have a dog and we go for walks 4 or 5 times a day. This vacuum cleans up everything we manage to track in and it’s way more quiet than my previous vacuum (which my dog appreciates). I also have allergies and the bags and filters help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this Miele Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Miele vacuum cleaner. Very portable, great suction, and attachments that work well! Really cleans all surfaces great.
customer_reviews.author: George 47

customer_reviews.title: I used to sell SEBO vauuums, great machines, but you know what? Mieles are just as good,Hmmm!
customer_reviews.text: Miele collected so much dirt that I had to order more dirtbags! This is a very handy machine. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's all you need.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It replaced a larger Miele. I love the size and how it is to maneuver and carry. Great suction.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bailey

customer_reviews.title: and it does a great job on both
customer_reviews.text: It's so neat, I have a rug and wood floors, and it does a great job on both. It reaches almost every where thanks to the length of the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some cheaper materials than older versions
customer_reviews.text: The extension handle has a plastic tip. This broke with an month so we went to a vacuum repair place for the older - more durable - metal version. Other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: 8Bobs

customer_reviews.title: It is well designed for a  multiple-level house: lightweight and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaints are that the floor head attachment needs a larger opening to make the width of the head useful. It only sucks up items that are located directly underneath the opening/hole. In addition, the power cord needs to be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Low

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Miele vacuum. It is light and handy, without sacrificing power. I appreciate the tool holders on this model. It does a great job on carpet, floors and furniture. I strongly recommend this vacuum for older people who don't want to lug around a heavy machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Giver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, lightweight and powerful suction. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is a repeat of a wonderful experience. Love this Miele
customer_reviews.text: I had a Miele in the past. This is a repeat of a wonderful experience. Love this Miele!
customer_reviews.author: David Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend *thumbs up*
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the price and for the brand. Good suction, great pieces of accessories and very sleek design overall.
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The actual product was not the same as shown in the photo!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: pleased with my new Miele Compact C1 Turbo Team Canister
customer_reviews.text: V. pleased with my new Miele Compact C1 Turbo Team Canister. I particularly like that it so light and portable and that it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Maralyn Rittenour

customer_reviews.title: Lousy construction
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum came defective. As it wasn’t noticed right away, I had to go through Mielle servicing. A part was put in backwards in its construction, breaking another part and I could only get the minimum suction. It took months to get it fixed and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum ever. I have used a lot in the past and I must say that I am pleased with all aspects of this vacuum. It did cost more but definitely well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well on floor, but does have a tough time on thick rugs
customer_reviews.author: veronica Vargish

customer_reviews.title: I love miele vacuums
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the larger version but this one is compact and works almost as well. I love miele vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum. It has great suction and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum. It has great suction and is very quiet. The only odd thing is that the handle doesn't have a power switch.
customer_reviews.author: djhart

customer_reviews.title: Good suction
customer_reviews.text: Love the vacuum works like expected. Efficient and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: This is a much better choice. Even my son uses it to vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, this vacuum is definitely worth it. I have been through 2 Dysons! This is a much better choice. Even my son uses it to vacuum the house.
customer_reviews.author: O. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best canister vacuum !
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wonderful vacuum. Great suction, very light, and maneuverability. Attachments are also excellent. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par.
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful. Golden retriever dog hair is getting tangled in the brush. The cord is not long enough. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not life-changing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using an upright my entire damn life and it suddenly occurred to me that a canister vacuum was what I need. I have lots of nooks and crannies, plus cats tracking litter and fur. It's definitely better for the nooks and crannies, but I'm still getting used to pulling the canister around. It's much more unwieldy than just pulling a cord around. I'm also still figuring out the best way to use it on low pile carpet. For the big spaces of carpet, my upright Oreck can't be beat. But I'm not unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wunderbar
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-use vacuum. What can you say German made. The thing works.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J Borders

customer_reviews.title: It is good as other famous brands
customer_reviews.text: For time being I liked it. Very much.I use it for my own apartment cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Farhad Moosavi

customer_reviews.title: This machine is the best vacuum ever produced It is absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.text: This machine is the best vacuum ever produced It is absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.author: Joe Crist

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great I bought two one for business and one for home
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Burchard

customer_reviews.title: Never had problems with Miele vacuums. Very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Miele vacuums for over 20 years. I think that’s the reason. Love Miele products
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perdew

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a powerful vacuum. I wish the cord and the hose were a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lyza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been contemplating for months which Miele vacuum to choose from. Result: Very happy, very easy to put together, and very easy to use as well. Quiet, smooth, and versatile (works really well on hardwood floors, tiles, and low pile carpet areas) Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money. Miniature vacuum like a toy, very cheap plastic attachments, not even a rubber bumper to protect furniture and molding. Strength of suction okay at highest level. I would go back to buying a Kenmore on sale any day.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: I love Miele products and this vacuum didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I love Miele products and this vacuum didn't disappoint. Very quiet and works as well as I expected it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! It does not suck, which makes it REALLY suck!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the WORST vacuum cleaner I have ever had! I have had Meiles for years and never had bad luck. The suction power is so low, you can barely use it. It is nowhere near as powerful as the old, tiny white Meile it was supposed to replace. Had I not had the flue for the past 3 weeks, I would have returned it. Now I am just stuck with this piece of junk. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: KatFace

customer_reviews.title: materials used are good
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and light but powerful. materials used are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kushmick

customer_reviews.title: I really like the floor attachment and the small attachments housed on ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is very light weight and powerful. I really like the floor attachment and the small attachments housed on the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such an EXPENSIVE VACUUM TO BREAK IN ONE YEAR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had this vacuum and it suddenly stopped working - was advised it was under warranty and brought it to the local service provider - He treated us as though we had 5 heads and would not take the warranty since we bought from AMAZON - WHAT????? We buy a $500 vacuum - it breaks and now we have to pay for it to be repaired AND get run around by Miele and the local vacuum guy??? I was told this is such a great vacuum - had my doubts since I can buy 3 vacuums for this price. Well, DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM IT WILL COST YOU MORE MONEY AND NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Yoga

customer_reviews.title: Hard floors, great. Carpet with pet hair, pretty poor.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is light and quiet and does a great job on our hardwoods and tile. It's NOT very good at all on our carpets and really struggles to pick up dog hair, which is frustrating. I've used it a few times and been disappointed each time on the carpets. Most of our house is Flor carpet tiles, so they are very low pile and our Bissell upright cleans them fairly easily. This does not. Did I get the wrong model? The description says its "ideal" for low to medium pile carpets. That is far from accurate.
customer_reviews.author: MTV in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on several very good reviews. I can't agree with them. While this model is compact, light, and maneuverable, the all-important suction power is mediocre at best. Even with a new, empty bag it doesn't do a good job of picking up debris such as leaf fragments and pebbles that I track in on my shoes. My floor is mostly low-pile carpet. The power brush is worthless. It comes to a stop as soon as it touches the surface. It won't even run well over my bedspread. I wasted nearly $400.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Dimmitt

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner is great. The suction is fine
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is great. The suction is fine, the tools are well designed, and it does a great job on carpet and rugs with the corresponding tool, or hard floors. It is light, which helps a lot, and relatively quiet. I have only had it for a few months but so far it is very satisfactory. The only downside is that it does not have a hook to secure the stem and suction head against the canister for storage in the upright position; it has one to store it in the horizontal position, which takes more space. But that really is a minor detail. I highly recommend this vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Not A True German Product
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works well. However, it is not a German made product. View the pictures and you will see it was assembled in China with German and China made parts.
customer_reviews.author: GLH

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use, good suction, HEPA filter available.
customer_reviews.text: Always bought cheap vacuums before, but this one is worth the premium. Lightweight, swiveling wheels let it scoot sideways, useful attachments, included rug attachment works pretty well on low-pile rugs (though not as well as a motor-driven one), relatively quiet, good suction. Somewhat unique and very important to me is the sealed compartment (no dust escapes) and the ability to fit a HEPA filter - important in a house that may have lead dust.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Cornell

customer_reviews.title: This sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! I research everything I buy and this just coming up as a best buy. Now I know why. We have carpets, hardwoods, dog, grandson/granddaughter in the house. This thing just keeps suckin' it up. Only complaint (and its a small one) the bag is a wee bit small and fills up rather quickly. Other than that my wife and I both love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ironman

customer_reviews.title: Love this vaccum!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It is light weight and comfortable to use, and turbo-strong at picking up dirt! It works on a lot of surfaces great! I had Miele vacuums, which I loved, and this one is even better! No more lugging around a heavy canister that can't get to all the crannies!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Miele doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Awwww, I love this vacuum. I hate upright vacuum cleaners and this does the job, gets everywhere and cleans nicely. I have a dog that sheds and my house is all carpeted throughout so I needed a powerful reliable vacuum and got it. Miele doesn't disappoint. The only thing is that could be better is cleaning the turbo brush.
customer_reviews.author: zyscla

customer_reviews.title: Miele C1 Turbo Vac
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5-star vac in many ways--as listed with stars above. My only miscalculation was the amount of cat hair build up each week from two long-haired cats would fill up the compacted bag. Not a good fit for me; my household conditions far surpass normal daily dirt load. But truly is an excellent machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jez

customer_reviews.title: The best suction; picks up every speck of dust.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. The suction is the best out of any vacuum I’ve ever used. It’s lightweight. I’m no longer exhausted after vacuuming. The tools are great. I did buy another attachment called ‘the twister’ because my entire downstairs is hard surface and I wanted a bigger attachment w more bristles. It handles pet hair like a charm. I’m very happy with this vacuum. I’ve had it for 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: shoefan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the retractable cord alone!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at this for years. I finally replaced my Dyson. Favorite features - it’s super light so I can hold it while doing drapes, it’s compact so I can store it under my kitchen sink, it is SO QUIET that I can use it at night (apartment living) and it is a demon on wood and tile!
customer_reviews.author: Clare S

customer_reviews.title: Both my cleaning lady and I love it! So does my dog because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised. Both my cleaning lady and I love it! So does my dog because it is so quiet! It is so light to move around . Just wish the cord was another 5 feet longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research for a new vacuum cleaner and this one got the best reviews. Now I know why. It is an awesome vacuum cleaner. Light, easy to pull around, does a magnificent job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miele is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Miele vacuum. It is well designed and very easy to use. Uprights cause me back pain. This canister moves easily, freely, and I have no problem getting under tables and beds with it.
customer_reviews.author: RoadRunnerBpBp

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Clearly better then the cheaper brands. 6 months ago I bought a Royal brand for the same price. Got tired of listing to the wife complain about it. This is a nice product. I like the way the long tube connects to the vacuum for storage
customer_reviews.author: Peter Durkin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Suction not nearly as good as my old sears power vac. This is light ...very easy to manoover...but bags are very small and don't hold a lot of dust/dirt. .....plus they are very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Excelent design and performance
customer_reviews.text: Tired of so-so inexpensive small vacuum cleaners, so when I discovered this high quality small machine I took the plunge. No regrets other than not buying it long ago and saving the money we spent on useless toy vacuums that were thrown out within a year.
customer_reviews.author: CalW

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with its preformance
customer_reviews.text: We needed a vacuum that was small, light and has a great suction and we found it. It is perfect for our island home. We have purchased Miele vacuums for our main residence and we are very pleased by its performance. We’d recommend Miele vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cat's hair often gets wrapped around the brush, at which point the brush stops working until you disassemble the turbo brush, get the hair out and put it back together. Turbo brush is not easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Best little canister vacuum I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this vacuum! It is extremely quiet and has great suction power. I may never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy1965

customer_reviews.title: He tells me he loves it, as much as you can love a vacuum cleaner...
customer_reviews.text: It was a housewarming gift to my son. He tells me he loves it, as much as you can love a vacuum cleaner... LOL
customer_reviews.author: Chasalz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dog and cat hair
customer_reviews.text: Stands up to it’s name product. We have a Shellie the long hair was hard to pick up. This is excellent for sag and cat hair. Small and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Perky

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect vacuum cleaner for my condo. Appears to be a quality product. No regrets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy from Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I've used a more expensive Miele product in the past. This one is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum worked very well. I thought the cord was too short.
customer_reviews.author: David Rieling

customer_reviews.title: Yeah I know that isn't usually a good idea but she asked for it
customer_reviews.text: This was a anniversary gift for my wife. Yeah I know that isn't usually a good idea but she asked for it. Great suction, very quiet, and lightweight to carry upstairs. We've had a couple of Dyson's in the past and this is far superior in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Young

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best vac cleaner we ever had. Quiet and very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd Miele and I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Miele and I love this brand. I bought this little jewel because we moved into an apt that had tile and carpet floors. I do not like pushing around the entire vacuum cleaner with every stroke like the uprights. Just a great brand, easy to use, lightweight, takes up less room, have same suction 15 or more years later, etc.
customer_reviews.author: debra s

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped, get a mroe powerful one if you are after suction.
customer_reviews.text: Suction could be a bit better, it is quite weak.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Miele Compact C1 Turbo Team canister vacuum cleaner
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1| Color:Obsidian BlackThe Miele Compact C1 Turbo team is a powerful vacuum in a space Saving design. Packaged with the stb205-3 air driven Turbo nozzle and a sbb parquet-3 it is designed to clean all your low pile to medium pile carpeting, area rugs, and hard floors.
feature_bullets: Reliably removes pet hair and lint with turbo brush.
Adjustable working height – Stainless steel telescopic tube
Effortless vacuuming of large areas w/ 29.5 ft operating radius
Gentle on sensitive hard floors - soft parquet brush

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Miele Compact C1 Turbo Team Canister Vacuum, STB205-3 Air Drive Turbo Nozzle, SBB Parquett-3 Hard Floor Nozzle, AirClean Filter, Dusting brush, crevice tool, upholstery tool
